meanings.definition: Willing to fit in with someone's wishes or needs.
meanings.sent1: She was very accommodative and agreed to change the meeting time to suit everyone.
meanings.sent2: The hotel staff was very accommodative, making sure all guests were comfortable during their stay.
meanings.sent3: The accommodating teacher allowed the students to choose their own group partners for the project.
meanings.sent4: His flexible and accommodative nature made him a favorite among his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The accommodating attitude of the team leader made the project run smoothly.

meanings.definition: Providing or adjusting to someone's needs or preferences.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant had an accommodative menu, catering to various dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent2: The company's customer service was highly accommodative, resolving issues promptly.
meanings.sent3: The accommodative hotel staff surprised the guests with personalized welcome gifts.
meanings.sent4: Her accommodative approach to teaching ensured that every student felt supported.
meanings.sent5: The accommodative policies of the organization made it a desirable place to work.
